# üèÜ Sub-Issue: Gamified Rewards & Recognition System

## Goal
Implement a point-based rewards system, badge achievements, leaderboards, and milestone celebrations to incentivize high-quality referrals and engagement.

## Tasks
- [ ] Design and migrate Prisma schema for points, badges, transactions
- [ ] Implement backend logic for awarding points and badges
- [ ] Build leaderboard API and caching layer
- [ ] Create frontend UI for badges, leaderboards, and notifications
- [ ] Add milestone celebration animations and email certificates
- [ ] Write tests for point/badge logic and leaderboard calculations

## Acceptance Criteria
- Points and badges awarded per rules in [parent issue](./referral-analytics-core.md)
- Leaderboards update correctly and are cached for performance
- UI displays badges, points, and leaderboards for all users
- Milestone celebrations trigger on achievements
